attractions.name: La Reserva Park
attractions.description: This park offers an ideal space to connect with nature, featuring trails, viewpoints, bridges, green areas, and picnic zones. Perfect for a family day out with abundant native flora and fauna.

attractions.name: Pompeya Municipal Theater
attractions.address: Paseo Peatonal Los Héroes, between Av. Valparaíso and Santiago Street, Villa Alemana
attractions.description: A cultural landmark of Villa Alemana, this theater is a Historical Monument. Guided tours showcase its history and architecture, and it frequently hosts folkloric performances and cultural activities.

attractions.name: Lo Godoy and Pejerreyes Wetlands
attractions.description: These urban wetlands are important environmental protection areas in the community. Ideal for birdwatching and enjoying local biodiversity, offering a natural retreat within the city.

attractions.name: Los Pavos Reales Eco-Reserve
attractions.description: For a closer wildlife experience, this private conservation initiative lets you observe peacocks up close in their natural habitat.

attractions.name: Belén Civic Park
attractions.description: Recently renovated, this park is a community gathering point featuring artisan stalls, entrepreneur pergolas, public restrooms, and a tourist information office - perfect for a leisurely stroll or finding local products.

attractions.name: Los Pinos Hill (Peñablanca)
attractions.address: Barrancas Street, Los Pinos neighborhood, Quilpué
attractions.description: Located near the Peñablanca station, Los Pinos Hill is a popular spot for family outings and gatherings, offering scenic views and natural surroundings for outdoor enjoyment.

attractions.name: Ítalo Composto Stadium
attractions.description: This municipal stadium is an important sports venue in Villa Alemana, hosting various football activities and community events - a reference point for local sports enthusiasts.

attractions.name: Paul Harris Public Library
attractions.description: A center of knowledge and cultural activities, frequently offering exhibitions, workshops for all ages, and various presentations, especially during events like Heritage Day.
